yury.name: Yury Butskevich
yury.description: Yury is the team lead of our code team. With extensive experience in frontend development, Yury has successfully completed numerous courses, continuously enhancing his skills. He is deeply passionate about frontend technologies and enjoys bringing innovative and user-friendly interfaces to life.

liza.name: Lizaveta Basarab
liza.description: Liza is a dedicated frontend developer with a strong passion for creating elegant and efficient web interfaces. She has a knack for turning complex designs into seamless user experiences and is always eager to learn new technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of web development.

valery.name: Valeryia Herasimenka
valery.description: Valeryia is a frontend developer passionate about creating user-friendly and visually appealing web applications. She aims to write clean and maintainable code that is easy to support and expand. She is always eager to improve her skills and explore new technologies.

about.title: About the Project
about.description: This application was created as part of training at RS School. GraphiQL is a powerful tool for working with the GraphQL query language. It is an interactive web environment designed to create, debug, and test GraphQL queries. The GraphiQL project makes it easy to interact with an API that uses GraphQL.

rss.title: The Rolling Scopes
rss.description: RS School offers a unique learning experience as a free, community-based online education initiative. No matter your age, professional employment, or place of residence. The RS School has been run by the Rolling Scopes community since 2013. The Rolling Scopes brings together developers of all levels who are passionate about technologies such as JavaScript, Front-end development, AWS, and more. Today, over 600 developer-volunteers from various countries and companies assist as mentors. We believe in important ideas that guide our mission.
